name: Grave Consequences
description:
You have to rob the graves by digging up the plots. Beware! Spooky scary skeletons, treasure or nothing may be the result. You can only carry so much treasure so make sure to bring it back to the van when your inventory is full!

P1 Controls: WSAD to move and Q to dig

P2 Controls: Arrow keys to move and right shift to dig.

Made for a 2019 Halloween Game Jam. Designer: Josh Keene, Programmer: Dominique Russell.
